title: Italian Football:Superman Intervention! Man Gatecrashes Italian Football Game After He Parachutes Himself Into The Stadium
text:
Superman Intervention! Man Gatecrashes Italian Football Game After He Parachutes Himself Into The Stadium

Superman Intervention! Man Gatecrashes Italian Football Game After He Parachutes Himself Into The Stadium

We have been much fascinated by the reel life superman, but the real life one, albeit costume less, showed up at the Italian game as he parachuted himself into the stadium.

AFP

It was a Sunday League classic moment, but it actually took place in the Italian top league game between Sassuolo and giants Inter Milan. A parachutist landed on the pitch during seven-goal Serie A thriller between the two sides in northern Italy.

The game was briefly suspended at Sassuolo's Mapei Stadium two minutes before the break.

AP

The hilarious scene took place before Romelu Lukaku was just about to take a penalty. The intervention for the football ages - the man in all blue ensemble, rather not really decked up for the football occasion, came down from up above, to be the hero.

My friend is at the stadium and just sent me this. @Inter_en was taking a penalty when this happened 😆#SassuoloInter #SASINT pic.twitter.com/uI0d4FMnwk — Simone (@bocedi) October 20, 2019

For the next few moments, he soaked up all the limelight before the security decided to send him packing.

The rather embarrassingly comic turn of events were no distraction for Inter striker Lukaku who dispatched the penalty.

Inter Milan ended up winning the game 4-3, but it was the parachute man who stole the show.
description: We have been much fascinated by the reel life superman, but the real life one, albeit costume less, showed up at the Italian game as he parachuted himself into the stadium. It was a Sunday League classic moment, but it actually took place in the Italian top league game between Sassuolo and giants Inter Milan.
